img_above_text:
![Bishui Cave Walkthrough \(19\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c9/Bishui_Cave_Walkthrough_%2819%29.png)
When you've knocked his health bar down, he'll retreat and Top Takes Bottom will take over. She'll jump to get into her half of the ball and spin toward you. This will be quick, but you can dodge out of the way of this. She will also imitate Bottom Takes Top and leap up with her sword, eventually rolling into her half of the ball.
img_below_text:
While they do share a lot of the same moves, you'll also find that Top Takes Bottom will throw her sword out like a boomerang, which you'll need to quickly evade. She will also perform an additional leaping attack, where her blade will glow and pools of lava will explode from underneath her. Jump back as soon as you see the blade land and start to glow.
![Bishui Cave Walkthrough \(20\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f3/Bishui_Cave_Walkthrough_%2820%29.png)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Bishui Cave Walkthrough \(19\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c9/Bishui_Cave_Walkthrough_%2819%29.png)
When you've knocked his health bar down, he'll retreat and Top Takes Bottom will take over. She'll jump to get into her half of the ball and spin toward you. This will be quick, but you can dodge out of the way of this. She will also imitate Bottom Takes Top and leap up with her sword, eventually rolling into her half of the ball."
        - Following Text: "While they do share a lot of the same moves, you'll also find that Top Takes Bottom will throw her sword out like a boomerang, which you'll need to quickly evade. She will also perform an additional leaping attack, where her blade will glow and pools of lava will explode from underneath her. Jump back as soon as you see the blade land and start to glow.
![Bishui Cave Walkthrough \(20\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f3/Bishui_Cave_Walkthrough_%2820%29.png)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a moment in the "Black Myth: Wukong" game during the Bishui Cave boss fight. The player character, armed with a staff, faces the boss "Top Takes Bottom," who is retreating and preparing for her next phase of attacks. The dark, rocky environment emphasizes the intensity of the battle. This scene aligns with the guide's description of the boss's transition into new attack patterns, such as spinning and leaping sword moves.
